result.title: ACM ICPC registration
result.content: Hello everyone! Please, could someone tell me, is everything ok with the registration of our team on subregional contest. There are three participants, we have a coach, we've filled all the necessary information about ourself and all the requerements are checked as ok (registration complete, on team certificate, on individual certificate), but the status of the team is "pending". I don't think it's ok and we don't want to miss the contest because of a registration. What should we do to get a team's status "accepted" or maybe "confirmed"?
